Observed at: Castlegar Airport 5:00 AM PDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers early this morning except flurries over higher terrain. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Snow level near valley bottom. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High 13. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 2 with risk of frost.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 2 with risk of frost. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Friday 21 April 2023
